message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. I'm asking for $115.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for the best price.  While I value your interest, $100 is just too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $107.50?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet at $107.50. Could you possibly lower the price to $102.50?
